title: How to Get Caviar in Stardew Valley and What You Can Do With It

steps.title: Place Sturgeon Roe in a Preserves Jar.
steps.content: Place Sturgeon Roe in a Preserves Jar. You must specifically have Sturgeon Roe to make Caviarâ€”any other Roe will turn into Aged Roe when placed in the Preserves Jar. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for four in-game days before collecting your Caviar.
steps.content: Wait for four in-game days before collecting your Caviar. Processing the Sturgeon Roe into Caviar takes four days, or 6,000 in-game minutes. Once the Roe has processed, you can collect it from the Preserves Jar, and you'll have Caviar.

steps.title: Wait until Summer or Winter.
steps.content: Wait until Summer or Winter. You can catch Sturgeon during Summer or Winter, so if you're not in one of those seasons, you will have to wait until Summer or Winter to find a Sturgeon. If you can access Qi's Walnut Room, you can buy Magic Bait that allows you to catch any fish regardless of the weather, time, or season. You can purchase Magic Bait for 5 Qi Gems, as well as the recipe for Magic Bait for 20 Qi Gems. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Go fishing in the Mountain Lake between 6 am and 7 pm.
steps.content: Go fishing in the Mountain Lake between 6 am and 7 pm. Sturgeon can be found during any weather, though you're most likely to find one on rainy Summer days. [3] X Research source Try casting further from shore for a better chance of catching a Sturgeon. You can also catch a Sturgeon on the Wilderness Farm during Summer and Winter. Sturgeon will randomly appear in Krobus's shop on Wednesdays for 200 gold or in the Traveling Cart for 600 to 1,000 gold.

steps.title: Place your Sturgeon in a Fish Pond.
steps.content: Place your Sturgeon in a Fish Pond. To collect Roe, you must place your Sturgeon in a Fish Pond. Sturgeon Roe is the only item that your Sturgeon can produce. You can differentiate Sturgeon Roe from other Roe as it's black in color. You can initially place up to 1 Sturgeon in your pond, but if you complete 4 quests, you can increase the pond capacity to 10. Sturgeon will reproduce once every 4 days.

steps.title: As an artisan good, Caviar sells for a good amount of gold.
steps.content: As an artisan good, Caviar sells for a good amount of gold. The base selling price for Caviar is 500 gold, but if you have the Artisan profession, you can sell your Caviar for 700 gold.

steps.title: Caviar is an option for the Missing Bundle.
steps.content: Caviar is an option for the Missing Bundle. The Missing Bundle is found in the abandoned JojaMart after you complete the Community Center . [4] X Research source Caviar is one of the six items you can submit to complete this Bundle.

steps.title: Most villagers like Caviar as a gift.
steps.content: Most villagers like Caviar as a gift. The only villagers who hate Caviar are Jas, Vincent, and Sebastian. However, no villagers love Caviar, so it may be better to choose gifts that don't have as high of a selling price.

steps.title: Caviar is used to make the Fashion Hat.
steps.content: Caviar is used to make the Fashion Hat. Simply place Caviar in the spool of the Sewing Machine to make the Fashion Hat.
